description.p: Your shapechanging is so complex, that it is hard to see through it even by magical means. You gain the following benefits

ul.li: Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on Saving Throw agains divination effects.
You can cast the Nondetection spell on yourself without spending spell slots or material components once. You must finish a long rest to do it again.

sheet.description: You have advantage on saving throws against divination effects and can cast Nondetection on yourself once per long rest.

description.p: You have managed through utilizing your skills to tap into your Doppelganger heritage and gain the following benefits

ul.li: You are immune to Sleep and Charm spells and effects.
You can cast Detect thoughts without spending spell slots or material componants 3 times. You must finish a long rest in order to replenish this ability.

sheet.description: You are Immune to sleep and charm effects and can cast Detect thoughts 3 times per long rest.
